==MS SQLSERVER版本==

{{{
CREATE  procedure MulitiPageSP
@sqlstr text,--(16)--varchar(8000), --查询字符串
@currentpage int, --第N页
@pagesize int --每页行数
as
set nocount on
declare @P1 int, --P1是游标的id
 @rowcount int
exec sp_cursoropen @P1 output,@sqlstr,@scrollopt=1,@ccopt=1,@rowcount=@rowcount output
select ceiling(1.0*@rowcount/@pagesize) as 总页数--,@rowcount as 总行数,@currentpage as 当前页 
set @currentpage=(@currentpage-1)*@pagesize+1
exec sp_cursorfetch @P1,16,@currentpage,@pagesize 
exec sp_cursorclose @P1
set nocount off
GO

if exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[KH_CustomInfor]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1)
drop table [dbo].[KH_CustomInfor]
GO
